gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components
Interface IMutableVirtualArray

All Superinterfaces:
IVirtualArray
public interface IMutableVirtualArray
extends IVirtualArray

This interface adds a method to set all values of a virtual array to one constant value. It is a convenience method common to virtual arrays whose values can be altered.

Method Detail

setAllValues

void setAllValues(float value)
Set all values in the array to a value. This method will usually serve to "initialize" or zero out the array.

Parameters:
value - - single value used to set all other values in the array
